title: Flexible
description:
Jonathan Bradley Welch, Mav Viola and Sharon Spell share stories about politicians in the closet, a gender journey and a battle with booze.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Fat Soul, Sharon Spell, Jeff Barr, The Bahama Soul Club, Jonathan Bradley Welch, XTC, Mav Viola)
